SEARCH
Package cycling

Class Checkpoint

java.lang.Object
cycling.Checkpoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Climb
public class Checkpoint extends Object implements Serializable
Checkpoint class that represents a checkpoint within a stage of a race. Each checkpoint is identified by an ID, has a specific location measured in kilometers from the start of the stage, is associated with a stage, and has a type that categorises the checkpoint.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Olly Johnson and Laith Al Qudah
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Checkpoint

      public Checkpoint(int id, double location, int stageId, CheckpointType type)
      Constructs a new Checkpoint with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the checkpoint.
      location - The distance from the start of the stage to the checkpoint in kilometers.
      stageId - The identifier of the stage that this checkpoint belongs to.
      type - The type of the checkpoint.
